endpoints.name: cliKey
endpoints.description: Send special keys (up, down, enter, tab)

endpoints.name: cliOutput
endpoints.description: Get recent output from CLI

endpoints.name: cliStop
endpoints.description: Stop the current CLI process

endpoints.description: Execute a Claude CLI command to edit code or create files in a project. Use this ONLY for code-related tasks.

endpoints.name: getProjects
endpoints.description: Get list of available projects

endpoints.name: vercelStatus
endpoints.description: Get latest Vercel deployment status and check if deployment succeeded or failed

endpoints.name: createGithubIssue
endpoints.description: Create a new GitHub issue in the repository

endpoints.name: lastGitPush
endpoints.description: Get information about the last git commit that was pushed to GitHub

endpoints.name: gitStatus
endpoints.description: Check git status: see modified files, current branch, and if working directory is clean. Use this to see what files have been changed.

endpoints.name: gitDiff
endpoints.description: View git diff to see exact changes made to modified files. Shows line-by-line changes.

endpoints.name: gitBranchList
endpoints.description: List all git branches and see which branch is currently active

endpoints.name: gitBranchManage
endpoints.description: Create a new git branch or switch to an existing branch. Use action='create' for new branch, action='switch' to change branches.

endpoints.name: packageInstall
endpoints.description: Install npm, pip, or yarn packages. Auto-detects package manager or specify with manager field. Use this when user asks to install dependencies.

endpoints.name: runTests
endpoints.description: Run project tests (npm test, pytest, etc). Auto-detects test command or specify custom command. Use this when user asks to run tests.

endpoints.name: searchFiles
endpoints.description: Search for files by name pattern in a project. Use this to find files when you don't know exact location.

endpoints.name: searchCode
endpoints.description: Search for code patterns across all files in project. Use this to find where functions, variables, or text appears in code.

endpoints.name: deployProject
endpoints.description: Deploy project to Vercel. Set production=true for production deployment. Use this when user asks to deploy.
